b:tag.cond: data:i == 3 and (data:font not in [data:fonts[0], data:fonts[1], data:fonts[2]])
b:tag.name: link

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To show the Comment System.*

b:if.script: /**/ function get_text(e){ret="";for(var t=e.childNodes.length,n=0;n<t;n++){var o=e.childNodes[n];8!=o.nodeType&&(ret+=1!=o.nodeType?o.nodeValue:get_text(o))}return ret}var words=get_text(document.getElementById("postBody")),count=words.split(" ").length,avg=200,counted=count/avg,maincount=Math.round(counted);document.getElementById("readTime").innerHTML=maincount+" minute read"; /**/

b:widget.title: "Engineering for All: Learn, Share, Grow for Free!"

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: "Explore the world of engineering with free knowledge, insights, and resources for every aspiring mind!"

b:if.p: Please Select Embedded Mode To show the Comment System.*

b:if.cond: data:post.body not contains "(hideAds)" or data:post.body contains "(showAds)"
data:post.body not contains "(hideAds)" or data:post.body contains "(showAds)"

b:if.script: /**/ function get_text(e){ret="";for(var t=e.childNodes.length,n=0;n<t;n++){var o=e.childNodes[n];8!=o.nodeType&&(ret+=1!=o.nodeType?o.nodeValue:get_text(o))}return ret}var words=get_text(document.getElementById("postBody")),count=words.split(" ").length,avg=200,counted=count/avg,maincount=Math.round(counted);document.getElementById("readTime").innerHTML=maincount+" minute read"; /**/

b:if.cond: data:view.isPost or data:view.isLayoutMode or data:view.isPage or data:view.isError
